data.prayer: Father, help the 2,193,652 believers in Pernambuco to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pernambuco, Brazil
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Pernambuco.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who are far from you in Pernambuco. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Pernambuco, Brazil.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Pipipa people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Pipipa people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Pipipa people is yours.
Father, you gave the church of Pernambuco, Brazil the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, 8,796,000 people live in the state of Pernambuco. Please, give them 1,759 new simple churches this year.
Father, let the threatened of Pernambuco, Brazil know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Pernambuco
location.cities_list: Recife, Jaboatão, Jaboatão dos Guararapes, Olinda, Paulista
location.cities_list_w_pop: Recife (1,478,098), Jaboatão (702,621), Jaboatão dos Guararapes (630,008), Olinda (366,754), Paulista (289,971)
